name: Flip Chase
description:
Introduction:

Blueberry Games' entry in the 2019 spring unreal engine game jam.

This is a 2 player local multiplayer game and requires two game pads to play.

Overview:

The first player to spawn is the prey (in white), the second player is the hunter (in red). Catch the prey as the hunter to score a point, or evade capture as the prey until time runs out. First player to 10 points wins.

Controls:

Left analogue: run

A or X on game pad: Jump

Escape: Quit
